subject: p14147787
History: Year old man with sarcoid, assess for stability of parenchymal infiltrates.
Impression: The bilateral upper lobe scarring including traction bronchiectasis is more evident today than it was on, consistent with and progression of pulmonary sarcoidosis. There is no evidence of central adenopathy or any pleural abnormality.
